item.title: More help needed (tos scape)
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

[quote=“j4v4ch1ck, post:11, topic:52077”][quote author=fozzy link=topic=73156.msg825615#msg825615 date=1169859059]

Zach sorry I’m posting this but I’ve seen you post about 4 help topics… why not just stay with one, and you’ve posted in 2 different sections? What is the point of that… Sorry.

wat u mean whats the point of that? mind ur own buisness. im tryin to get some help because this is really gettin on my neves

'Lo, why don’t you try to help him instead of telling him that he’s got 4 other help topics, hmm javachick?
[/quote]

Why don’t you try to ignore what I posted insted of being a smart ass. I know it must be hard. But I don’t feel like spamming it was simply a question no reason for ethier of your responses to it.[/quote]

Also, why don’t you try to ignore the 4 topics that he’s posted, considering there’s 12K+ topics in here. I am almost 100% sure, that someone else has posted 4+ topics in here, K?

[hr]
Anyways, if I were you Zachary, I would just try compairing different servers. That’s what I do sometimes when I can’t figure out how things work, sometimes it works.

Read full topic

item.title: More help needed (tos scape)
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

Ok, this is whats happened. I have Tos-Scape. When you die in-game, you get sent to the bank, and the items you are wearing go back into your inventory. is there ANY WAY to make it when you die, you lose ALL items? Please help me, you will be admin! Please!
Ok, this is what i got, when i search oh dear, thease are what i get. removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); castOnPlayer.currentHealth = castOnPlayer.maxHealth;

Read full topic
